original_text: And he shall have the inside of the house scraped all around, and the plaster that they scrape off they shall pour out in an unclean place outside the city.
korean_text: 또 집 안 사방을 긁게 하고 그 긁은 흙을 성 밖 부정한 곳에 쏟아버리게 할 것이요

sentences.original_text: And he shall have the inside of the house scraped all around
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 집 안쪽을 사방에서 긁어내게 할 것이요

sentences.original_text: the plaster that they scrape off
they shall pour out in an unclean place outside the city
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 성 밖 부정한 곳에 쏟아낼 것이니라
